abstract: Deepak Chopra’s fictionalized biography about the life of the Prophet Muhammad will go on sale early in e-book form, weeks ahead of the print book’s publication date of Sept. 21.
snippet: Deepak Chopra’s fictionalized biography about the life of the Prophet Muhammad will go on sale early in e-book form, weeks ahead of the print book’s publication date of Sept. 21.
lead_paragraph: “Muhammad,” Deepak Chopra’s fictionalized biography about the life of the Prophet Muhammad, will go on sale early in e-book form, weeks ahead of the print book’s publication date of Sept. 21. HarperCollins, the book’s publisher, said it had authorized Amazon and other e-book retailers to sell the book beginning Wednesday, trying to meet demand for the book since the national conversation has turned to Islam and the planned community center and mosque near ground zero. Read more at ArtsBeat…

headline.main: ArtsBeat: Deepak Chopra’s ‘Muhammad’ to Be Released Early as E-Book
